com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer

Class LinearCongruentialGenerator

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer.LinearCongruentialGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<Integer>, PrimitiveIterator<Integer,IntConsumer>, PrimitiveIterator.OfInt

    public class LinearCongruentialGenerator
extends Object
implements PrimitiveIterator.OfInt
    This class creates a random permutation of all ints from 0 (inclusive) to a given maximum (exclusive) with no repeats. It implements a linear congruential generator and achieves O(N) in runtime, O(1) in memory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface PrimitiveIterator
